sense.def:
A nerve
je dolgo, tanko vlakno, po katerem potujejo sporočila med možgani in drugimi deli telesa.

Z besedo
nerves
označujemo sposobnost človeka, da v stresnih okoliščinah ostane miren in nezaskrbljen.

seg.quote: Hoping to calm our nerves, we decided to spend the afternoon at the lake.

sense.def:
Nerve
je pogum, ki ga človek potrebuje, da naredi kaj težavnega ali nevarnega.

seg.quote: Nobody had the nerve to remind him that he was several hours late.
He got on my nerves tonight with his fishing stories.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da človek
had a nerve to do something
ali
had the nerve to do something
, to pomeni, da nas je razjezil, ker je naredil nekaj žaljivega ali nespoštljivega;

seg.quote: He had the nerve to say Fleet Street was corrupting me.
